blogPost.excerpt: Nice backgrounds. Get inspired whenever you open a new tab. I'll upload a new Bernie in Mittens image daily. Have something you'd want to share with the world in this way? Email josh@sirchit.com
blogPost.body: Nice backgrounds. Get inspired whenever you open a new tab. I'll upload a new Bernie in Mittens image daily. Have something you'd want to share with the world in this way? Email josh@sirchit.com
blogPost.title: Bernie in Mittens - A new Bernie in Mittens with your new tabs.
blogPost.author: Josh Ruby

localize.description: 漂亮的背景。每当你打开一个新的标签时，就会得到灵感。我每天都会上传一张新的 "穿米特斯的伯尼 "图片。有什么东西你想以这种方式与世界分享？发邮件给 josh@sirchit.com
localize.tagline: 一个新的伯尼在Mittens和你的新标签。

localize.description: 漂亮的背景。每當你打開一個新的標籤時，就會得到靈感。我每天都會上傳一張新的 "穿米特斯的伯尼 "圖片。有什麼東西你想以這種方式與世界分享？發郵件給 josh@sirchit.com
localize.tagline: 一個新的伯尼在Mittens和你的新標籤。
